content: नभस् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [नह्यते मेघैः नह्-असुन् भश्चांतादेशः; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 4. 210</ls>] {@--1@} The sky, atmosphere; <ls>R. 5. 29</ls>; <ls>Bg. 1. 19</ls>; <ls>Rs. 1. 11.</ls> {@--2@} A cloud. {@--3@} Fog, vapour. {@--4@} Water. {@--5@} Period of life, age. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} The rains or rainy season. {@--2@} The nose, smell. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of the month of Śrāvaṇa (corresponding to July-August), (said to be {%<ab>n.</ab>%} also in this sense); प्रत्यासन्ने नभसि दयिताजीवितालंबनार्थी <ls>Me. 4</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 29</ls>; <ls n="R.">17. 41</ls>; <ls n="R.">18. 6.</ls> {@--4@} The fibres in the root of the lotus. {@--5@} A spittingpot. --(Dual) Both the worlds, heaven and earth.
